trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument"></xref> instance to and from Atom 1.0 format.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter"></xref> class.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument"></xref> to serialize.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument"></xref> that can be serialized into an <`atom:categories`> element within a service document and the set of categories are specified within the element.

An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument"></xref> that can be serialized into an <`atom:categories`> element within a service document and the set of categories are referenced using an URI.
Verifies whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid Atom 1.0 categories document.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
A value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid Atom 1.0 categories document.

Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument"></xref> that can be serialized into a <`atom:categories`> element within a service document and contains the set of categories within the element.
Returns an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument"></xref> that can be serialized into a <`atom:categories`> element within a service document.

Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument"></xref> that can be serialized into a <`atom:categories`> element within a service document and contains a URI reference to the set of categories within the element.
Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument"></xref> that can be serialized into a <`atom:categories`> element within a service document.
Reads an Atom 1.0 <`atom:categories`> element from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
The syndication version used by the formatter.

Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema"></xref> method.
Override this method to return your own schema.
`Null`.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> use to read the XML document.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> used to write the XML node.
